name.japanese: シャーロット・リンリン

keyMoments.title: Big Mom's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Big Mom debuts in silhouette form on Whole Cake Island, displaying her massive size, pink bloodshot eyes, and obsessive love for sweets. She awaits the candy shipment from Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one of the Four Emperors and a major antagonist who will drive significant plot developments in future arcs.

keyMoments.title: Big Mom Refuses Treasure
keyMoments.description: Big Mom refuses Luffy's offer of treasure to replace the eaten candy, declaring she will pursue him in the New World instead.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Big Mom's irrational obsession with sweets and sets up the future conflict with Luffy.
keyMoments.quote: I don't want treasure! I want candy! I'll come after you in the New World, Straw Hat!

keyMoments.title: Big Mom Eats Her Crew
keyMoments.description: Big Mom eats some of her own crew members who failed to meet her expectations, demonstrating her volatile and terrifying nature.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Big Mom as an unpredictable and dangerous ruler, even to her own subordinates.

reveals.information: One of the Four Emperors of the Sea
Has an obsessive and irrational love for sweets, prioritizing them over treasure
Claims Fish-Man Island as her territory, demanding 10 tons of candy monthly for protection
Will eat her own crew members when displeased

relationships.description: Big Mom declares she will pursue Luffy in the New World after he eats her candy. Luffy responds by declaring he will defeat her.

evolutionMoments.description: Big Mom and Luffy speak via Den Den Mushi, establishing their rivalry.

relationships.description: Charlotte Pudding is one of Big Mom's many daughters.
Pekoms is a combatant in Big Mom's crew and is terrified of her.

name.japanese: シャーロット・プリン

keyMoments.title: Charlotte Pudding's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Pudding appears briefly sitting near Big Mom on Whole Cake Island. Her third eye is visible at this early appearance.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of a character who becomes crucial hundreds of episodes later. The visible third eye is significant foreshadowing.

reveals.information: Has a third eye (visible in this episode, not hidden)

relationships.description: Charlotte Pudding is Big Mom's daughter.

keyMoments.title: Pekoms Debuts
keyMoments.description: Pekoms, a lion mink and combatant of the Big Mom Pirates, appears at the candy factory to collect the monthly tribute for Big Mom.
keyMoments.significance: First mink character shown in the anime. Introduces an important Big Mom Pirates member.

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Luffy's Declaration
keyMoments.description: Pekoms is shocked and horrified when Luffy declares war on Big Mom and claims Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: His reaction emphasizes how unprecedented and dangerous Luffy's challenge is.

reveals.information: Pekoms is a lion mink, the first mink shown in the series
Member of the Big Mom Pirates as a combatant
Aggressive and intimidating, but terrified of Big Mom

relationships.description: Pekoms serves Big Mom as a combatant and is terrified of disappointing her.
Pekoms works alongside Tamago as a partner collecting tributes for Big Mom.

keyMoments.title: Baron Tamago Debuts
keyMoments.description: Baron Tamago, a long-legged man wearing an eggshell with a teacup and saucer as a hat, debuts alongside Pekoms at the candy factory.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces another key Big Mom Pirates member with a more diplomatic personality.

keyMoments.title: Recommends Accepting Treasure
keyMoments.description: Tamago suggests to Big Mom that the treasure Luffy offers is valuable enough to accept, showing his more pragmatic thinking.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Tamago's diplomatic and calculating nature, contrasting with Big Mom's irrationality.

reveals.information: Baron Tamago is a long-legged human
Member of the Big Mom Pirates as a combatant
More diplomatic and pragmatic than his partner Pekoms

relationships.description: Tamago serves Big Mom as a combatant and attempts to give her pragmatic advice.
Tamago works alongside Pekoms as a partner collecting tributes for Big Mom.

keyMoments.title: Bobbin's Introduction
keyMoments.description: Bobbin appears at Whole Cake Island and reports to Big Mom that he destroyed a country that failed to pay their monthly tribute.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the brutal enforcement methods of the Big Mom Pirates and the consequences of failing to pay tribute.
keyMoments.quote: I destroyed the island and it smelled sweet when I did.

reveals.information: Known as 'Sweeper' for his role in destroying territories
Bishop-ranked combatant of the Big Mom Pirates
Responsible for destroying countries that fail to pay tribute to Big Mom

relationships.description: Bobbin serves Big Mom by enforcing tribute payments through destruction.

keyMoments.title: Napoleon's Silhouette Debut
keyMoments.description: Napoleon appears for the first time as what seems to be a bicorne hat on Big Mom's head. His sentient nature is not yet revealed.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of one of Big Mom's special homies, though its true nature won't be revealed until much later.

reveals.information: Appears as a bicorne hat on Big Mom's head

relationships.description: Napoleon is a special homie created by Big Mom using a fragment of her own soul.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Accidentally Reveals Eating the Candy
keyMoments.description: Luffy enthusiastically thanks Pekoms and Tamago for the candy, unwittingly revealing the Straw Hats consumed Big Mom's tribute.
keyMoments.significance: A classic Luffy moment where his honesty creates a diplomatic crisis.
keyMoments.quote: Thank you for the sweets, they were delicious!

keyMoments.title: Luffy Answers Big Mom's Call
keyMoments.description: When Pekoms and Tamago are too afraid to answer, Luffy casually picks up the Den Den Mushi and speaks directly with Big Mom, taking full responsibility.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's fearlessness and integrity as a captain.
keyMoments.quote: I ate all the candy! But don't worry, I'll give you this treasure instead!

keyMoments.title: Luffy Declares War on Big Mom
keyMoments.description: Luffy boldly declares he will defeat Big Mom and claim Fish-Man Island as his own territory, directly challenging a Yonko.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most important moments as Luffy enters the New World, showing his growth in ambition and confidence. Sets up major future arcs.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to beat you and make Fish-Man Island my territory!

reveals.information: Shows willingness to directly challenge a Yonko and claim territory like the great pirates

relationships.description: Luffy declares war on Big Mom after she threatens to pursue him for eating her candy.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy and Big Mom speak via Den Den Mushi, establishing their rivalry.
